statements: SELECT * FROM hardware_components_inventory;
SELECT component_name, vendor_name FROM hardware_components_inventory;
SELECT component_id, quantity FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY component_name DESC
SELECT component_name, vendor_name, quantity FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE vendor_name = 'vendor1'
SELECT component_id, component_name, location FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Room%'
SELECT * FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 AND location = 'Storage Room'
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS component_count FROM hardware_components_inventory GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING component_count > 1 ORDER BY component_count DESC
SELECT * FROM hardware_components;
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_id, location FROM hardware_components WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT * FROM component_history ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hardware_components WHERE component_name = 'RAM';
SELECT component_name, location FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT component_name, quantity, location FROM hardware_components WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_name, quantity, location FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 AND location != 'Warehouse';

SELECT ch.action, ch.action_date, hc.component_name FROM component_history ch LEFT JOIN hardware_components hc ON ch.component_id = hc.component_id WHERE ch.action = 'Installed' ORDER BY ch.action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hardware_components
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components ORDER BY component_name DESC
SELECT component_name, location FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM component_manufacturers
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM component_manufacturers
SELECT * FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY component_id DESC
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components WHERE location='Warehouse 1'

SELECT hc.component_name, ci.quantity, cm.manufacturer_name FROM hardware_components hc JOIN component_inventory ci ON hc.component_id = ci.component_id JOIN component_manufacturers cm ON hc.component_id = cm.manufacturer_id
SELECT * FROM hardware_components WHERE component_id IN (1, 3, 5)

SELECT hc.component_name, SUM(ci.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hardware_components hc JOIN component_inventory ci ON hc.component_id = ci.component_id GROUP BY hc.component_name HAVING total_quantity > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM item_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM item_locations WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory_items ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM inventory_items JOIN item_categories ON inventory_items.item_id = item_categories.category_id;
SELECT item_name, location_name, capacity FROM inventory_items JOIN item_locations ON inventory_items.location = item_locations.location_name;
SELECT * FROM hardware_components LIMIT 5
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT component_name, storage_location FROM hardware_components ORDER BY storage_location ASC
SELECT * FROM component_types WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT component_id, event_date FROM component_history ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM hardware_components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY component_name ASC
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM hardware_components WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A' LIMIT 3
SELECT c.component_name, h.event_date, h.event_description FROM hardware_components c JOIN component_history h ON c.component_id = h.component_id WHERE YEAR(h.event_date) = 2022
SELECT type_name, description FROM component_types ORDER BY type_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.component_name, s.quantity, s.last_updated FROM hardware_components c JOIN component_stock s ON c.component_id = s.component_id WHERE s.quantity < 5
